description:
Trek up a peak, around a lake or through the forest. The stretchy and soft fabric of the Trekr Pants is comfy all day long. Need extra carrying capacity? Two low-profile side pockets add storage without bulk. When the weather warms up, cinch up the cuffs to convert them to cute capris.

  • Made from stretchy REKOIL fabric that feels soft
  • KÜHLKURVE contoured waistband is higher in the back for extra coverage
  • Internal drawcord and belt loops give you options for fine-tuning the fit
  • 2 front pockets, 2 back pockets, and 2 hidden side zippered pockets for on-the-go storage
  • On hot days, cinch up the legs to convert the pants to capris
name: Kuhl Trekr Pants - Women's
